scenario.sendMessageH248: !/2 [[remoteHostH248]]:[remotePortH248] T=[newTransID]{ C=${ A=ip/1/access1/${ M{ ST=1{ O{ MO=IN, tman/sdr=800, ds/dscp=0x00 }, L{ v=0 o=mhandley 2890844526 2890842807 IN IP4 [localHostH248] s=SDP Seminar i=A Seminar on the session description protocol u=http://www.cs.ucl.ac.uk/staff/M.Handley/sdp.03.ps e=mjh@isi.edu (Mark Handley) c=IN IP4 [localHostH248]/127 t=3034423619 3042462419 a=type:H332 a=recvonly:20 b=CT:128 m=video 49232/2 RTP/AVP 98 i=mavideo a=rtpmap:98 amr/8000/1 a=fmtp:98 mode-set=1,octet-align=1,crc=0 b=SA:256 c=IN IP4 [localHostH248]/127 m=audio 49230/3 RTP/AVP 96 i=monaudio a=rtpmap:96 L8/8000 b=CT:128 c=IN IP4 [localHostH248]/127 }, R{ v=0 o=mhandley 2890844526 2890842807 IN IP4 [localHostH248] s=SDP Seminar i=A Seminar on the session description protocol u=http://www.cs.ucl.ac.uk/staff/M.Handley/sdp.03.ps e=mjh@isi.edu (Mark Handley) c=IN IP4 [localHostH248]/127 t=3034423619 3042462419 a=type:H332 a=recvonly:20 b=CT:128 m=video 49232/2 RTP/AVP 98 i=mavideo a=rtpmap:98 amr/8000/1 a=fmtp:98 mode-set=1,octet-align=1,crc=0 b=SA:256 c=IN IP4 [localHostH248]/127 m=audio 49230/3 RTP/AVP 96 i=monaudio a=rtpmap:96 L8/8000 b=CT:128 c=IN IP4 [localHostH248]/127 } } } }, A=ip/1/core/${ M{ ST=1{ O{ MO=RC, tman/sdr=800, ds/dscp=0x00 }, L{ v=0 o=mhandley 2890844526 2890842807 IN IP4 [localHostH248] s=SDP Seminar i=A Seminar on the session description protocol u=http://www.cs.ucl.ac.uk/staff/M.Handley/sdp.03.ps e=mjh@isi.edu (Mark Handley) c=IN IP4 [localHostH248]/127 t=3034423619 3042462419 a=type:H332 a=recvonly:20 b=CT:128 m=video 49232/2 RTP/AVP 98 i=mavideo a=rtpmap:98 amr/8000/1 a=fmtp:98 mode-set=1,octet-align=1,crc=0 b=SA:256 c=IN IP4 [localHostH248]/127 m=audio 49230/3 RTP/AVP 96 i=monaudio a=rtpmap:96 L8/8000 b=CT:128 c=IN IP4 [localHostH248]/127 } } } } } }
